document_data.name: ''Noble Might''
document_data.creator: [[Siamorphe]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Noble Might''''' was a heavily enchanted scepter wielded by [[Siamorphe]], the Divine Right.
document_data.Description: ''Noble Might'' was forged from the purest [[adamantine]] alloy.
document_data.Powers: The scepter served as a ''+5'' enchanted weapon during combat. Additionally, it possessed all of the combined powers of a [[Netherese]] ''[[blast scepter]]'', a ''[[rod of rulership]]'', and a ''[[staff of curing]]''.
